Reviews.Title: “Good base for sightseeing, close to tubes”
Reviews.Author: lilminx2
Reviews.Content: stayed husband 4 nights january sightseeing trip london hyde park hotel base close queensway shopping street plenty shops restaurants pubs tube stations hotel staff friendly helpful negatives bathroom hardly close door couldnt squeeze past sink cold source heat electric heater left bed window probably didnt help breakfast continental grand start day staff leave tray cornflakes croissant outside door morning overall didnt pay lot money feel hotel value kitchenette tv idea base london

Reviews.Title: “Great location, easy with close tube access”
Reviews.Author: maria_barrett
Reviews.Content: especially bathroom staying night stayed preferred price loved loved restaurants shopping close didnt reception particularly friendly loved london enjoyed visit london return definitely try else location hear lot noise neighbouring night

Reviews.Title: “Correct for this price”
Reviews.Author: BennyAn
Reviews.Content: hyde park hotel value memorable pay hotels sometimes hard cities london double bed kitchenette collegue slightly bigger expensive cooked kitchen close bed fridge nice food drinks bathroom okay clean shower person fine wifi 4th floor connection bit weak sometimes time climb floors sit stairs connection location okay nice safe neighbourhood walking night 10 15 min walk nearest underground station overall bad stay youre looking decent expensive hotel

Reviews.Title: “excellent place”
Reviews.Author: tambi_10
Reviews.Content: lovely couldnt fault stayed tuesday 22nd partners birthday read reviews booked partner london bit nerves clean polite staff lovely location

Reviews.Title: “Best rate and a comfortable Victorian neighborhood feel”
Reviews.Author: Bothbusinessleisure
Reviews.Content: american found cozy hotel charming close attractions west victorian outside makes london modern inside look travel front desk staff helpful time ill stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean and modern room in a great location”
Reviews.Author: lisschris
Reviews.Content: reception noise heard street typically extremely clean modern comfortable efficient bathroom kitchenette handy utensils location excellent tube stations choose queensway bayswater 10 minutes heart price stay

Reviews.Title: “It was ok if not to mention 10 minutes walk to tube twice a day...”
Reviews.Author: LamanVJ
Reviews.Content: weve stayed hyde park hotel october 2010 hotel nice shabby looking recently refurbished left overall feeling freshness cleanliness bayswater location easy access 24hr buses hotel station onthe map actualy 10 minutes walk streets looking personally tough thats ive lost times hotel probably comment valuable people struggle topography cool outside warm heating system didnt immediately heater receiption overall staff nice heater iron directions numerous questions weve friendly willing help comfortable service hotel shuttle bus heathrow cheaper tube definitely comfortable office corner check email allow print charge pleasant experience inside hotel move little bit closer stop

Reviews.Title: “Like staying in an Ikea showroom”
Reviews.Author: inkedman
Reviews.Content: walk lancaster gate tube station eventually found hotelwe greeted loosely speaking enthusiastic hotel arrived restaurant etcbut satisfactory faulty stuffy theyre biggest window found night til 4am foreign nocturnal loud conversations street title suggests straight ikea wrong actually ikea furniture feel bid odd straight catalogue standard double tinyand bedsvery uncomfortable woke bad morning takes plus cleaned day actual bayswater nice loads eat dont venture city night tip suggest dont trek day maybe stay bit closer action means moneybut worth itbut taxi oxford street £10

Reviews.Title: “amazing location, easy going staff and we had a lovely stay”
Reviews.Author: matawale
Reviews.Content: colleagues bigger helpfull staff simple straight pont lovely little dont expect beds hard dont mind beds dont decide try

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was fine for the price but the hardest beds I've ever come across can be found here”
Reviews.Author: BurnleyLad
Reviews.Content: hotel reasonable money pay quiet staff helpful real reviewers bed uncomfortable bed world dont mind firm bed awful rock hard exaggeration management reading please serious consideration changing beds hotel stay whilst beds

Reviews.Title: “I would prefer to sleep on a snooker table”
Reviews.Author: LondonVictoria78
Reviews.Content: hotel location whilst amenities size bathroom adequate absolutely explanation bed literally uncomfortable bed slept floor table family hard mattresses actually shocked dont book hotel decent nights sleep

Reviews.Content: stay hotels world five six times worst hotel experience hyde park makes fawlty towers look flawless fivestar hotel late july decided spend 5 nights london august difficult hotel hyde park appeared vacancies understand sent email 9 days arrived top floor arrived basement dark cold smelly tiny window night move floor 4 nights kept knocking elbows hardly suitcase bed hard maid forgot clean towels wooden floors loud people apart generator outside hotel water tap sounded plane taking lucky sleep 230 630 am exhausted day leave airport reception forgot wakeup call positive location hotel queensway underground stations try look bright hotel experiences

Reviews.Title: “if you want more than just a room,dont go!!!! no bar, no restaurant,no lounge.no nothing!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: elliemay19
Reviews.Content: led believe continental breakfast consisted stale cheerios pint milk delivered breakfast lounge bar expected sit bed eat reccomend

Reviews.Title: “Newly renovated - but they did not get it right”
Reviews.Author: misteracdc
Reviews.Content: comments nutshell pros location easy reach public transport shops restaurants central london surprisingly quiet location newly tastefully modern style cons basement wall skirting sound proofing connecting door hear person breathe door actually person heard breathing charged breakfast price included breakfast dont serve 830 am bad leave hotel time unusual maybe travel friends colleagues breakfast guests continental breakfast delivered forced breakfast yourself stay paid 100 gps night disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Like sleeping on a slab of marble.”
Reviews.Author: Litlun17
Reviews.Content: hotel reasonably clean quiet definitely money bed absolutely rock hard im floor comfortable checked immediately realized running water trickling bathroom walls reported desk clerk shrugged taking shower similar hotels advise staying elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “I would never stay here again through choice.”
Reviews.Author: fempisces
Reviews.Content: company paid £125 night 3 stay windows bedside lighting corridor breakfast consisted 2 stale croissants sugary cereal consumed bed dining facilities box cereal covered sugar informed beds hard sleep poor sleep floor staff friendliest time heard guests complaining shouting am surprised internet access hotel cost £7 day genuinly rip definately reccomend avoiding hotel wherever isnt worth trying obtain complaints form address write regarding issues comments care hence resort write warn instead dealing hotel directly

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location!”
Reviews.Author: Eline_K
Reviews.Content: stayed hyde park hotel form friday morning till monday evening enjoyed stay people wrote reviews bit didnt bother didnt expect huge travelling central london friend looked amazing beds comfortable shower nice location absolutely bayswater road fun expansive restaurants underground station bayswater closest five minute walk stay station closed saturday sunday literally minute bayswater station queensway central underground line directly central london 15 minutes hotel central london absolutely overall deal money london probably ill probably hotel id definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Clean, tidy, SMALL ROOMS!!”
Reviews.Author: abs90
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed london birthday found hard hotel stayed found easier locate pros little kitchen space little mean tiny cant fridge properly beds rock hard bed stayed modern looked comfy rock solid 7 days ache stove pan pan cook pasta frying pan close oxford street hyde park nice little walks park location excellent price expensive cheapest guess thats travel london restaurents close nice theres variety mexican bbq food theres shopping centre cinema inside expensive tesco close easy quickly nip shop stayed bottom floor bit noise outside disturbed mornings overall nice stay probably wouldnt stay becasue rock hard beds

Reviews.Content: ok hotel maid daybut indeed hardly move inside ta spent hour outside eventhough tired matress wes hard sleep blankets sleep central heating wasnt th 4th floor blankets told hotel booked imagine means london temperature approximately 4 degrees celcius hotel offer kitchenette coffee personnel helpful
